name: Abzan Guide
text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Morph {2}{W}{B}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "These roads are desolate and changeable. Follow me, or die in the wastes."

name: Bear's Companion
text: When Bear's Companion enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Bear creature token.
flavor: "The Sultai came hunting for a bear hide. Now I have a belt of naga skin, and my friend has a full belly."

name: Bloodsoaked Champion
text:
Bloodsoaked Champion can't block.
Raid — {1}{B}: Return Bloodsoaked Champion from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if you attacked this turn.
flavor: "Death is merely another foe the Mardu will overcome."

name: Chief of the Edge
text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor: "We are the swift, the strong, the blade's sharp shriek! Fear nothing, and strike!"

name: Chief of the Scale
text: Other Warrior creatures you control get +0/+1.
flavor: "We are the shield unbroken. If we fall today, we will die well, and our trees will bear our names in honor."

name: Heir of the Wilds
text:
Deathtouch
Ferocious — Whenever Heir of the Wilds attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Heir of the Wilds gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: In the high caves of the Qal Sisma mountains, young hunters quest to hear the echoes of their fierce ancestors.

name: Kin-Tree Warden
text:
{2}: Regenerate Kin-Tree Warden.
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: "The amber of the tree and the blood of my veins are the same."

name: Mardu Hateblade
text: {B}: Mardu Hateblade gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor: "There may be little honor in my tactics, but there is no honor in losing."

name: Mardu Hordechief
text: Raid — When Mardu Hordechief enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.
flavor: The horde grows with each assault.

name: Mardu Skullhunter
text:
Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield tapped.
Raid — When Mardu Skullhunter enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

name: Seeker of the Way
text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."

name: Snowhorn Rider
text:
Trample
Morph {2}{G}{U}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Sure-footed, strong-willed, and ill-tempered—and so is the ram.

name: Surrak Dragonclaw
text:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Creature spells you control can't be countered.
Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor: Both his rank and his scars were earned in single combat against a cave bear.

name: Timely Hordemate
text: Raid — When Timely Hordemate enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Tuskguard Captain
text:
Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

name: War-Name Aspirant
text:
Raid — War-Name Aspirant enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
War-Name Aspirant can't be blocked by creatures with power 1 or less.
flavor: No battle means more to a Mardu warrior than the one that earns her war name.
